most_divergent.statement: 1:** Therapeutic neuroplasticity occurs at ~15-50% 5-HT2A occupancy, where Gq/11-PLC-IP3/DAG signaling dominates, activating mTOR-dependent BDNF expression and dendritic spine growth in prefrontal cortex.

2:** Above ~60% occupancy, β-arrestin 2 recruitment increases supralinearly due to cooperative binding at 5-HT2A/mGluR2 heterodimers, uncoupling mGluR2 inhibitory signaling and producing excessive layer V cortical glutamate release.

3:** The therapeutic index is ~10-15 (ED50 plasticity ~3-5 mg oral psilocybin; TD50 destabilization ~40-60 mg), consistent with FDA TI ≥ 10 prior, and this ratio is governed by the ~3-5× concentration gap between Gq EC50 and β-arrestin 2 EC50 at 5-HT2A.

4:** Psilocin Ki at 5-HT2A is 6-25 nM (pKi ~7.6-8.2), and with Hill coefficient ~1 (non-cooperative single-site), occupancy follows standard hyperbolic kinetics—the apparent nonlinearity at ~60% is an emergent property of downstream pathway coupling, not receptor binding itself.

1:** Psilocybin’s therapeutic window (20–50% 5-HT2A occupancy) is defined by preferential Gq/11-PLC activation, driving BDNF/mTOR-mediated neuroplasticity in prefrontal cortex (PFC) without network desynchronization.

2:** Perceptual destabilization at >60% occupancy results from β-arrestin 2 recruitment to 5-HT2A/mGluR2 heterodimers, uncoupling mGluR2’s inhibitory brake on glutamate release and causing thalamocortical desynchronization.

3:** The therapeutic index (TD50/ED50) of ~10–15 for psilocybin is constrained by the abrupt β-arrestin 2 recruitment threshold at >60% occupancy, aligning with FDA’s minimum safety margin (PRIOR: therapeutic_index_minimum = 10.0).

4:** Psilocin’s Ki at 5-HT2A is 6–25 nM (pKi 7.6–8.2), with low doses (1–10 mg) yielding plasma concentrations of 2–20 nM (~10–60% occupancy) and high doses (>25 mg) reaching 100–500 nM (>80–95% occupancy).

5 (SPECULATIVE):** CYP3A4 inhibition by CBD (threshold = 1.0 µM) may indirectly widen psilocybin’s therapeutic window by reducing psilocin metabolism, but this effect is negligible at typical CBD doses (PRIOR: CBD_therapeutic_window = 1–10 µM).
Psilocin Kd at human 5-HT2A = 6-25 nM (pKi 7.6-8.2), yielding ~20-50% occupancy at therapeutic 1-10 mg doses ([psilocin] 2-20 nM) and >80% at high >25 mg ([psilocin] >100 nM).

recommendation: S3 gate FAILED. The system did not converge to stable consensus. This indicates genuine scientific disagreement worth investigating. Review the divergence map below.
